Code: EXEC SQL INSERT INTO seguros.vg_acessorio(NUM_ACESSORIO, COD_SIGLA_ACESS, DES_ACESSORIO, COD_USUARIO, DTH_TIMESTAMP, IND_TP_ACESSORIO, IND_APRES_ADICIONAL) VALUES (:NUM_ACESSORIO, :COD_SIGLA_ACESS, :DES_ACESSORIO, :COD_USUARIO, CURRENT TIMESTAMP, :IND_TP_ACESSORIO, :IND_APRES_ADICIONAL) END SQL
